title: The Gunmen | Bonanza 1960 (Western TV series) Michael Landon, Lorne Greene, Dan Blocker

sources.title: The Gunmen | Bonanza 1960 (Western TV series) Michael Landon, Lorne Greene, Dan Blocker
sources.description:
Welcome to Kiowa Flats, where mistaking cowboys for gunslingers is just the beginning of the fun! Join Hoss and Joe as they navigate a wild mix-up involving the feuding Slade Brothers, romance, and a whole lot of poetry. It's a comedic ride you won't want to miss in this episode of laughter and mistaken identities!

Original title: Bonanza: The Gunmen (1960)

Director: Christian Nyby
Writers: Carey Wilber, David Dortort, Fred Hamilton
Genre: Western, TV series 
Starring: 
Dan Blocker
Michael Landon
Lorne Greene
Pernell Roberts
Henry Hull
George Mitchell
Douglas Spencer
King Donovan

00:00 Full episode (with subtitles).
01:03 Encounter with notorious Slade boys in Kiowa Flats leads to a tense situation in a saloon.
01:32 Warning to avoid Kiowa Flats due to Slade boys' presence.
02:31 Reports of a giant and a small man approaching, causing concern among the townsfolk.
08:00 Unsettling encounter in a deserted town leads to suspicions and a decision to stay despite strange vibes.
14:16 Conflict arises as characters are accused of being hired killers in a feud between two families.
21:03 The desire to have the tribute buried with someone.
25:46 Black Alonzo relays message to Pa about mistaken identity and gratitude for jailbreak.
28:22 McFadden gives ultimatum to gunmen to complete job or face consequences, leading to a standoff.
35:43 Gramps Hadfield's search for the missing hog leads to conflict with the McFaddens.
41:40 The Women, Ouisey and Susan, demand their husbands to put down guns.
